footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Iansan | Update Date: 05/10/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Symphonist of Scents__
Easy to trigger passives that buff ATK% for the team. Energy may be an issue in some teams.

__Favonius Lance__
Best Supportive 4-star weapon, providing Energy.

__Missive Windspear, Tamayuratei no Ohanashi__
Event Weapons from 3.1 and 5.4 respectively. Although free options, neither can have full uptime on passives.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Calamity Queller__
A lot of ATK% and high Base Attack make this weapon highly effective. Energy may be an issue.

__Engulfing Lightning__
High Base Attack and Energy Recharge sub-stats make it best when the team gives Iansan a high Energy Requirement.

__Vortex Vanquisher, Skyward Spine, Lumidouce Elegy, Staff of Homa__
5-star statsticks that can be used.

__The Catch, Prototype Starglitter__
Either fish or craft if none of the above options are available.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: The Three Principles of Power
**N/A)** Elemental Skill: Thunderbolt Rush
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Weighted Spike

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Energy Requirements with Favonius Lance:__
180%-210% for Solo Electro, 140%-160% for Double Electro. (Assume 30%-40% less for C1, 20%-30% less if other Favonius Weapons)

__Other Weapons__
220%-270% for Solo Electro, 150% -180% for Double Electro. (Assume 40%-60% less for C1, 20%-30% less if other Favonius Weapons)

__Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City__ is best for almost every team by a large margin, and also lowers Energy Recharge requirements. It is not recommended to farm other sets for her.
